title: 3 and Out - AFC/NFC Championship Pressure Rankings, Preview; Ballard Should Beg Luck; Eagles Wentz Rebuild; Larry Scott's Pac-12 Failure
itunes:title: 3 and Out - AFC/NFC Championship Pressure Rankings, Preview; Ballard Should Beg Luck; Eagles Wentz Rebuild; Larry Scott's Pac-12 Failure
description:
In this episode, John previews the massive NFL Conference Championship Weekend and gives his team and QB pressure rankings. He also discusses the Colts' options for replacing Philip Rivers, why Chris Ballard should put the full court press on Andrew Luck to comeback, why Philip Rivers deserves all the respect, if new Eagles Head Coach Nick Sirianni can fix Carson Wentz, why Larry Scott's terrible Pac-12 legacy will be his unwillingness to embrace the football cash cow, and previews Conference Championship Weekend matchups, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
